lead_paragraph: The Afghan officer who shot and killed six American soldiers Monday had been in the border police since 2008.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

snippet: The Afghan officer who shot and killed six American soldiers Monday had been in the border police since 2008.

headline.main: Afghan Killer of Six Americans Was Trusted Police Officer
headline.seo: Afghan Who Killed 6 Americans Was Trusted Police Officer
headline.print_headline: Afghan Who Killed 6 G.I.’s Was Trusted Police Officer

byline.contributor: An Afghan employee of The New York Times contributed reporting from Nangarhar Province.
